channel.title: Collections of lessons on
channel.description: Recent content in Collections of lessons on

item.description: tags: #lesson Zero to optimization in ten steps This guide serves as a medium-length approach to developing an understanding of how to perform multidisciplinary design optimization (MDO) assuming no prior knowledge of MDO.
tags: #lesson Checklist for doing good optimization Main message A systematic approach is needed to solve complex MDO problems and understand the results.
tags: #lesson What to do when someone gives you a model Main takeaway You must understand the model, how data is passed, the design space, etc.
